content: **now €6 50 for a limited time no coupon needed** this pattern is also available for free on my blog in a 3-part blog series 1 there are video tutorials for every step of the way linked in both the paid pdf and in the free pattern on my blog construction this is a simple toe-up sock pattern with german short row heel we start at the toe knit the foot the heel the leg and finally the cuff sizes instructions are included for 6 adult sizes ranging from eu35-47 us 5-14 uk 2 5-12 languages this pattern is available in english and dutch the videos are in english only paid pdf the pdf version is ad-free and easy to print as it is separate for each language every purchase is much appreciated as a lot of work went into this pattern thank you all so much 1 https //newleafdesigns nl/2017/05/30/simple-toe-up-socks/
